title: Go Premium
subtitle: Get inspired and enjoy high-quality content.
premium-description: Unlimited everything and option to invite teammates for 5€/mo per seat.
basic-description: Access selected flows and create up to 3 private collections.
stripe-payment-error-msg: There has been an error with the payment provider, please try later
filters-description: They work as you would expect them to work
create-collections-description: Store your favourite designs the way you like it. Share it with others, or don't. You have all the options at hands!
premium-flows-description: Apple Watch. Revolut. N26. Wise. Bolt. Bondora. Starship. Many other apps are here as well. Enjoy watching them.
